post.body: Dungeon Siege--Vai'kesh (sp?) warriors and necromancers and all sorts of nasty demented and plagued creatures.
you need to come meet our babies. I may be having a birthday party--need to give my friend the goahead to throw it.
Calypso sends meows and is trying to help me type!
Ummm...how BIG of a room does the spawn have? *grins*
more likely they were fooling around with the servers or the scripts and something went belly up.
You make it easy, hon. *smoochies* and get your ass back to work now!
maybe I'll send Sam out for Hellboy 2. :)
you can do it, babe. You know I believe in you. :)
WOOOOOT!!!!! WOOOHOOO...told you to start at the top!
noticed that--seems to have started this afternoon.
hiya! I'm making a sausage mango stirfry with sausage, broccoli, zucchini, carrots, mushrooms, water chestnuts, mangos...yum!
book video-need oogey monster. may buy squid (from grocery) and play with pictures. there's a delightful thought. (I love calamari)
I had the chance to get on Jeopardy some years back, but got terribly sick right before the auditions. Man I was disappointed.
it *did* hurt-all of them, though some more than others. I don't think I had a session in the chair shorter than two hours.
done did bash me some monsters, now I'm going to go eat some chocolate and pet me some furbles who are vying for attention.
Must. Go. Bash. Monsters. Or watch monsters being bashed.
Dinner was definitely worth the time it took to prepare. *smacks lips* *gracefully*
time to go read a ms I'm blurbing and make dinner...think I might watch Hellboy again. LOVE his character. (Gotta love big men & big guns)
Sometimes I feel like an artistic Dr. Frankenstein.
Ever try to turn a picture of a brain into a squid monster? Not so easy! :)
